title: gcd
description: Write a function `gcd` that takes two positive integers m and n and returns their greatest common divisor (GCD). **Note:** You must implement your own version; you cannot use Racket's built-in `gcd` function.

examples.explanation: The greatest common divisor of 12 and 18 is 6
7 and 5 are coprime, so their GCD is 1
The greatest common divisor of 24 and 36 is 12
